title: Kiss shitai tte Nedattemiro yo
original_name: キスしたいってねだってみろよ
sinopse:
A stimulating lip love starting from a kiss! A dreamy girl who falls in love with a player who's both a popular model and young actor starts living together with him after an unexpected turn of events. With a contract not of her own volition, she is forcefully kissed everyday by him who is the "No. 1 guy who girls want to kiss!?"

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
